sprint_goal: Establish the secure, sandboxed transformation engine backend and the foundational API for script CRUD operations.
key_deliverables: Functional Jint Engine, Secure Sandbox, Script CRUD API, RBAC, At-Rest Encryption
demo_objectives: Demonstrate script creation via API; Show script content encrypted in DB; Prove sandbox termination via tests.
success_criteria: All backend integration tests for core engine, sandbox, and CRUD are passing.
risk_factors: Jint sandboxing complexity; Encryption key management setup.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize security-focused unit tests; Follow documented best practices for .NET Data Protection.
burndown_target: Complete 17 story points by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Develop the user-facing script editor and the critical preview functionality.
key_deliverables: Monaco Editor UI, Three-Pane Layout, /preview API, Preview logic (sample/live data), Structured Error Handling
demo_objectives: Show real-time syntax highlighting in Monaco; Demonstrate script preview with sample JSON; Show a script timeout error.
success_criteria: E2E test for script preview is passing; Monaco editor integration is stable.
risk_factors: Monaco editor build configuration complexity; Frontend state management for async preview.
mitigation_strategies: Allocate spike time for Monaco setup; Define clear API contracts early.
integration_windows: API integration for preview endpoint by Day 5.
burndown_target: Complete 18 story points by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Implement advanced features like versioning, data handling limits, and UI warnings.
key_deliverables: Script versioning with history, diff, and revert; Max dataset size enforcement; JSON schema validation of output.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate reverting a script to a previous version; Show a job failing due to invalid output schema.
success_criteria: E2E test for script revert workflow is passing; Integration test for schema validation is passing.
risk_factors: Complexity of UI for version comparison (diff view); Performance of schema validation.
mitigation_strategies: Use a mature diff-viewer library; Benchmark schema validation early.
burndown_target: Complete 15 story points by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Implement production-readiness features: auditing, monitoring, and reliability.
key_deliverables: Audit trail for sandbox violations; Prometheus metrics endpoint; Job isolation for engine crashes; Performance benchmark test.
demo_objectives: Show a timeout violation in the audit log; Scrape the /metrics endpoint with Prometheus; Demonstrate service stability when a script crashes.
success_criteria: Performance benchmark test is passing in CI; All audit and metric integration tests are passing.
risk_factors: Setting up a hardware-consistent environment for performance tests; Ensuring audit trail immutability.
mitigation_strategies: Work with DevOps to provision CI runner; Use restricted DB permissions for audit logs.
burndown_target: Complete 13 story points by end of week 1.

sprint_goal: Finalize documentation and prepare for a safe, controlled production rollout.
key_deliverables: System-wide feature flag; Production cutover/rollback plan; Comprehensive user and API documentation.
demo_objectives: Demonstrate enabling/disabling the entire feature with the feature flag; Review final documentation artifacts.
success_criteria: Feature flag E2E tests are passing; All documentation is peer-reviewed and published.
mitigation_strategies: Involve developers and QA in the documentation review process.
burndown_target: Complete 9 story points by end of week 1.
